citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the facility representative stated that a Texas Longhorn got its horns stuck in a hay feeder
located in the outdoor enclosure on August 17, 2024 around 10am. The attending veterinarian and team were notified
immediately. The Longhorn was safely removed from the hay feeder and given supportive care throughout the day, but
the animal was not able to stand after the incident. The attending veterinarian instructed the team to check on the animal
throughout the night. On August 18, 2024, an employee was checking on the animal approximately around 2:20pm and
found him deceased. The facility removed the hay feeder after the incident. Any equipment used within the housing facility
should be structurally sound and protect the animal from injury. The facility must determine a method for animals to
consume their daily diet safely and without injury.
CORRECTION DATE: Corrected prior to inspection on 30 SEPT 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
At the time of inspection, the facility representative stated that a Texas Longhorn got its horns stuck in a hay feeder 
located in the outdoor enclosure on August 17, 2024 around 10am. The attending veterinarian and team were notified 
immediately. The Longhorn was safely removed from the hay feeder and given supportive care throughout the day, but 
the animal was not able to stand after the incident. The attending veterinarian instructed the team to check on the animal 
throughout the night. On August 18, 2024, an employee was checking on the animal approximately around 2:20pm and 
found him deceased. The facility removed the hay feeder after the incident. Any equipment used within the housing facility 
should be structurally sound and protect the animal from injury. The facility must determine a method for animals to 
consume their daily diet safely and without injury.  
 
CORRECTION DATE: Corrected prior to inspection on 30 SEPT 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
